description:
“Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.”
Well, Machine Learning can look like magic, but you don't need to be a
data scientist or an ML researcher to develop with ML.

So, what about making your solution smarter without any knowledge in AI?
With pre-trained models and a few lines of code, Machine Learning APIs
can analyze your data. Moreover, AutoML techniques can now help in
getting even more specific insights tailored to your needs.

In this session, you'll see how to transform or extract information from
text, image, audio & video with the latest ML APIs, how to train an
AutoML custom model, and you'll be an active player of a live demo.
Don't put your smartphone in airplane mode!
title: Building smarter solutions with Machine Learning, from magic to reality
